column4: i have a microsoft mouse with a little button on each side that is made hitting the 'back' and 'forward' button on web browsers, but it's not working in ubuntu. is there a way to get it to work or is it for windows only?
there are ways to get it to work, but I don't know what it is off the top of my head.  I once did it for my logitech mouse.
best guess would be to get the type of mouse and start googling and looking in the forum.  It will probably me a small change to the xorg.conf file
